import { Slide} from 'react-slideshow-image' import React, { Component } from 'react' import './Slider.css' export class Slider extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { slideImages: [ "images/pexels-jasmin.jpg", "images/pexels-ashman.jpg", "images/pexels.jpg", "images/pexels-felipe.jpg", ] } } render() { const { slideImages } = this.state const properties = { duration: 1500, transitionDuration: 2500, infinite: true, indicators: true, arrows: true } return (
come shop with us

And reliable jewelry
AdmirreKavvy
) } } export default Slider
